document_data.mainbody:
harp-eye Neem was a goblin who joined the cult of the the Absolute during the late 15 century DR.
Neem had brown skin that she decorated with white body paint. She wore a suit of crudely-fashioned scale armor and leather bracers.
As of the , Neem remained stationed at the Shattered Sanctum, a former temple of Sel√ªne that was taken over by the cult of the Absolute.
